description: ClusterCIDRSpec defines the desired state of ClusterCIDR.

ipv4.description: IPv4 defines an IPv4 IP block in CIDR notation(e.g. "10.0.0.0/8"). At least one of IPv4 and IPv6 must be specified. This field is immutable.

ipv6.description: IPv6 defines an IPv6 IP block in CIDR notation(e.g. "fd12:3456:789a:1::/64"). At least one of IPv4 and IPv6 must be specified. This field is immutable.

nodeSelector.description: NodeSelector defines which nodes the config is applicable to. An empty or nil NodeSelector selects all nodes. This field is immutable.

perNodeHostBits.description: PerNodeHostBits defines the number of host bits to be configured per node. A subnet mask determines how much of the address is used for network bits and host bits. For example an IPv4 address of 192.168.0.0/24, splits the address into 24 bits for the network portion and 8 bits for the host portion. To allocate 256 IPs, set this field to 8 (a /24 mask for IPv4 or a /120 for IPv6). Minimum value is 4 (16 IPs). This field is immutable.
